data.fullContent: Engineers have several tools at their disposal when it comes to building massive structures. One such tool is computers. Computer-aided design (CAD) programs are used to develop virtual models of the proposed structure. These models may be used to test different aspects of the design, such as stress on the structure; this type of testing is known as finite element analysis (FEA). FEA can examine the stress on a structure as it is tested under different conditions, including ideal weather on a sunny day, hot, cold, and stormy days, and different elevations. Computer simulations have allowed engineers to test the proposed designs and make changes before construction begins. Also, estimates of how much materials will cost are available before the work begins, saving both materials and labor.

q1.translation: 当涉及到建造巨大的结构时，工程师有几种可用的工具。其中一个工具就是计算机。
q1.front: Engineers have several tools at their disposal when it comes to building massive structures. One such tool is computers.
q1.content: Engineers have several tools at their disposal ____ it ____ to ____ massive ____. One such tool is computers.

q2.translation: 当涉及到建造巨大的结构时，工程师有几种可用的工具。其中一个工具就是计算机。计算机辅助设计(CAD)程序用于开发虚拟模型的拟议结构。这些模型可用于测试设计的不同方面，如结构上的应力;这种测试被称为有限元分析(FEA)。有限元分析可以检测结构在不同条件下的应力，包括晴天、炎热、寒冷和暴风雨天的理想天气和不同的海拔高度。计算机模拟使得工程师们能够在施工开始前对设计方案进行测试和修改。此外，在工作开始之前，可以估算材料成本，从而节省材料和劳动力。
q2.front: Engineers have several tools at their disposal when it comes to building massive structures. One such tool is computers.
q2.middle: Computer-aided design (CAD) programs are used to develop virtual models of the proposed structure.
q2.ending: These models may be used to test different aspects of the design, such as stress on the structure; this type of testing is known as finite element analysis (FEA). FEA can examine the stress on a structure as it is tested under different conditions, including ideal weather on a sunny day, hot, cold, and stormy days, and different elevations. Computer simulations have allowed engineers to test the proposed designs and make changes before construction begins. Also, estimates of how much materials will cost are available before the work begins, saving both materials and labor.

options.sentence: By understanding the principles of engineering, engineers are able to use mathematics to solve complex problems.
Computer-aided design (CAD) programs are used to develop virtual models of the proposed structure.
Bridge design is a process that begins with an understanding of the physics of a structure.
Architects and engineers work together to design buildings that are safe and efficient.

options.sentence: Computer simulations have allowed engineers to test proposed designs and make changes before construction begins, saving both materials and labor.
Engineers are responsible for the design of new buildings, bridges, dams, canals, skyscrapers, and other massive constructions.
Engineers must design buildings that are tall enough to be safe but also sturdy enough to withstand earthquakes and other natural disasters.
Engineers use mathematics to solve complex problems and ensure that the plans are properly constructed before they are built.
